alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:42AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Menard, western Logan, Sangamon, southeastern Mason and southeastern Morgan Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 641 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middletown to near Springfield to near Waverly. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elkhart and Middletown around 645 AM CDT. Sherman and Rochester around 650 AM CDT. Riverton and Williamsville around 655 AM CDT. Lincoln, Chatham and Divernon around 700 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Springfield, Pawnee and Cornland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 6. Interstate 55 between mile markers 78 and 132. Interstate 72 between mile markers 83 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central and west central Illinois.
